brand.slogan: Brilliant outcomes through technology enabled learning.

auth.title: Welcome to Elysia
auth.eula: By signing up, you agree to our <terms>{{terms}}</terms> and <privacy>{{privacy}}</privacy>.
auth.eula-required: You must agree to the terms and conditions

forgot-password.title: Reset your password
forgot-password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot-password.confirmation: If an account is registered with {{email}}, we have sent an email to verify your identity. Please check your inbox for a password reset link. If you don't see the email, be sure to check your spam or junk folder.

reset-password.title: Set a new password
reset-password.bad-token: Reset password link has expired or is invalid

songs.no-songs-action: Click below to upload a new song now
songs.no-performances: You have not performed this song yet.
songs.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the song '{{song_name}}'? This action cannot be undone.

play.song-not-found: We're sorry, that song is not available or cannot be found
play.no-microphone-permission: You must allow microphone access to connect to the song player.
play.uploading-description: Please wait while we upload your recorded performance. This may take a few moments.
play.upload-finished-1: Your work has been uploaded, and is currently being reviewed.
play.upload-finished-2: You will be notified when your performance is available for viewing.
play.upload-finished-3: While you wait, you may re-attempt another performance or try performing another song. Thank you for your submission.

validators.too-short: This must be at least {{min}} characters long
validators.too-long: This cannot be longer than {{max}} characters long

password.missing-capital: Password must contain at least one capital letter
password.missing-number: Password must contain at least one number

username.invalid-characters: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

errors.network-error: A network error occurred, please try again

backend.usr003: you are not authorized to update this user
backend.usr005: you are not authorized to get request information about this user
backend.usr007: user does not meet minimum age requirements
backend.usr012: signup key has already been used
backend.usr013: you are not authorized to create a user at this role level
backend.usr014: This username has been taken. Please choose another
backend.usr015: This email has been taken. Please choose another
backend.tkn003: user could not be verified from token
backend.pswd001: failed to create password reset token
backend.sng006: you are not permitted to modify this song
backend.inst001: you are not permitted to view this institution
backend.pfr001: the audio format submitted is not supported
backend.pfr002: the audio file could not be saved
backend.pfr004: failed to convert audio file to required format
backend.pfr005: failed to persist file path record
backend.pfr006: you are not authorized to access information about these performances
backend.pfr009: could not generate access code for performance
backend.gnrl002: the resource you are looking for could not be located

unknown: Something went wrong, please try again.
